name: just press start
description:
just press start. It's easy...

please click that big,white button to get that point...

oh... it's not over yet...

you should find out other ways to "press start"...

-a gameplayless masterpieceless adventure! inspired (CoPiEd) by Please don't touch anything

-7 different ways to "press start"

-a option menù! (this is my first attempt to make a menù in scratch)

(tell me if you found all the starts)

made for the "anything goes jam"

p.s. please don't click all those start in this text,they won't work ;P
